name: Ice Bogie
description: The Ice Bogie is a small fey creature known for its stealth and quick evasion. It has a low strength but excels at dexterity-based tasks.
memorable: The Ice Bogie can evade threats with Nimble Escape and supports allies by sacrificing its own health to restore theirs.
goals: Typically aims to deceive and support allies in combat situations.
relations: Often found in groups with other Ice Bogies, maximizing their Pack Tactics ability.
environment: Usually inhabits cold environments where its immunity to cold is advantageous.
strengths: Highly adept at stealth, with advantage on attack rolls when allies are near.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage and has low hit points.
attacks: Uses Icicle Fist for melee cold damage and Spiteful Hail for ranged cold damage, imposing speed reduction.
most_powerful_ability: Nimble Escape allows quick disengagement from combat.
skills: Excels in stealth with a +4 bonus.
additional_information: Immunities to cold and poison damage
Gains advantage on attack rolls with allies nearby

tricky fey that uses icy attacks
